author: Anonymous Mouse
title: Practice Problem HtDF P9
question:
This is a problem from the HtDF P9.
I wrote the tests as below and still get an error sign.
check-expect cannot compare inexact numbers. Try (check-within test 1.4142135623730951 range).
How can I fix it to work properly?
(check-expect (distance 3 0 0 4) (sqrt (+ (sqr (- 3 0)) (sqr (- 0 4)))))
(check-expect (distance 1 0 0 1) (sqrt (+ (sqr (- 1 0)) (sqr (- 0 1)))))
(define-struct roots (x sqrt))
(check-within (roots-table (list 1.0 2.0 3.0))
              (list
               (make-roots 1.0 1.0)
               (make-roots 2  1.414)
               (make-roots 3  1.713))
              0.1)
instructor_answer:
I'm a little unsure how to help you.  The problem bank problem htdf P9 asks for a single function of four arguments called distance.  What you are showing above is one part of the design for that function, and then a couple other fragments of something else I'm not sure about.
Could you put your complete design above and then we can help.  Also please use the {;} button in the post editor to make a code block, and then paste your complete design into that.
